main_menu.title: PHOENIX CONTACT INDUSTRIAL ETHERNET SWITCHES
main_menu.description: Phoenix Contact industrial Ethernet switches are engineered to deliver reliable and secure network communication in demanding industrial environments. Designed for automation systems, manufacturing plants, and infrastructure networks, these switches ensure stable data transmission even under vibration, temperature fluctuations, and electrical noise. With rugged metal housings and industrial-grade components, they support high network uptime and efficient industrial communication architecture.

menu_drop1.name: 5 Port Industrial Ethernet Switch
menu_drop1.description: The Phoenix 5 Port Ethernet Switch is designed for compact automation cells and small industrial networks requiring stable and uninterrupted communication. It provides reliable data exchange between PLCs, HMIs, drives, and industrial devices. With plug-and-play functionality and rugged housing, it ensures long-term operation in control cabinets and machine installations.

menu_drop2.name: 8 Port Industrial Ethernet Switch
menu_drop2.description: The 8 Port Phoenix Ethernet Switch is suitable for medium-sized automation systems where multiple devices need stable network connectivity. It supports high-speed industrial communication, enabling seamless integration of PLCs, sensors, and distributed I/O systems. Its durable construction ensures reliable performance in harsh industrial conditions.

menu_drop3.name: 16 Port Industrial Ethernet Switch
menu_drop3.description: The 16 Port Phoenix Ethernet Switch is designed for large-scale industrial networks requiring high device connectivity and stable data exchange. It is widely used in plant automation, process industries, and infrastructure projects. Advanced network reliability and rugged hardware ensure continuous system performance with minimal downtime.

main_menu2.title: PHOENIX CONTACT SLIM RELAY MODULES
main_menu2.description: Phoenix Contact slim relay modules are designed for space-saving signal switching and interface applications in industrial control panels. Their compact design allows high-density installation without compromising reliability. These modules provide electrical isolation, fast switching, and dependable long-term operation in automation and process control environments.

menu_drop2_1.name: 5 Port Slim Relay Module
menu_drop2_1.description: The 5 Channel Slim Relay Module from Phoenix Contact is ideal for compact control panels where space efficiency is critical. It ensures safe switching between control and load circuits while maintaining signal clarity and long-term operational stability.

menu_drop2_2.name: 8 Port Slim Relay Module
menu_drop2_2.description: The 8 Channel Slim Relay Module supports higher switching density while maintaining compact installation. It is widely used in PLC interface panels, machine automation, and signal distribution systems.

menu_drop2_3.name: 16 Port Slim Relay Module
menu_drop2_3.description: The 16 Channel Slim Relay Module is designed for high-output automation systems requiring multiple relay controls within limited cabinet space. It ensures stable switching performance and electrical isolation in industrial applications.

main_menu3.title: PHOENIX CONTACT RELAY BOARD SOLUTIONS
main_menu3.description: Phoenix Contact relay boards are engineered for organized and reliable load switching in industrial control cabinets. These boards provide strong electrical isolation, simplified wiring layout, and enhanced safety in automation systems. They are widely used in PLC output expansion, motor control circuits, and automation interface systems.

menu_drop3_1.name: 5 Channel Relay Board
menu_drop3_1.description: The 5 Channel Relay Board is designed for small automation applications requiring dependable switching of multiple electrical loads. Its organized terminal layout and durable components ensure smooth operation in industrial panels.

menu_drop3_2.name: 8 Channel Relay Board
menu_drop3_2.description: The 8 Channel Relay Board supports medium-level automation systems requiring reliable signal control and load switching. It ensures safe electrical separation and stable performance under industrial conditions.

menu_drop3_3.name: 16 Channel Relay Board
menu_drop3_3.description: The 16 Channel Relay Board is ideal for large-scale industrial automation systems requiring multiple output controls in a single compact module. It provides reliable switching, enhanced protection, and long operational durability for demanding industrial applications.
